response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to both parties, I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer not only ensures that you get a fantastic deal but also allows you to benefit from its high-quality features at a reasonable cost. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
